StartAllotmentEventModalComponent.Title: Start Allotment event
StartAllotmentEventModalComponent.SubTitle: Total Tokens:
StartAllotmentEventModalComponent.EmptyBalance: It's impossible to start the Allotment event, there are no project tokens on the balance
StartAllotmentEventModalComponent.BadDate: It is impossible to start the Allotment event, because the start date of the event plus the freeze time is less than the end date of the event
